summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Licensing and regulation of Taxicabs, adding Sections 500, 501, 502, 503, 504, 505, 506, 507, 508, 510, 511, 512, 514, 520, 521, 523, 524, 525 and 526 to the License Code (Ordinance 48022) and repealing Ordinances 59866, 62610, 69144, 69377, 69585, 69680, 70429, 71905, 73762, 74086, 78208, 79136, 80008, 80648, 86242, 87597, 87630, 89192, 91012, 91670, 92658, 93542, 93887, 94021, 95032, 95501, 95715, 96433, 97192, 97839, 99225, 100479, 102637, 103347, 103690, 103380, 106133, 106178, 106189, 106609, 107135, 107144, 107351, 107574, 107742, 107918 and 108087, and other ordinances or parts thereof inconsistent herewith, amending Section 36 of the Weights and Measures Ordinance (Ordinance 98820) to increase the taximeter inspection fee, and amending Sections 14, 21, and 401, and adding Section 21.3 to the License Code (Ordinance 48022).
